item.title: Precision Transit Solution for Luxury Timepieces
item.content: A multi-layered high-density EPP foam solution for a global luxury watch distributor. The project required 100% impact protection during international transit, with custom-fitted cavities for 12 unique watch models. The result was zero transit damage over 10,000 shipments and a 15% reduction in packaging weight.

item.title: Surgical Instrument Sterilization Trays
item.content: Design and production of medical-grade, sterilization-ready foam tray inserts for complex neurosurgical sets. The material was required to withstand autoclave temperatures while maintaining structural integrity. Our solution provided 30% faster surgical setup times through improved instrument organization and identification.

item.title: Architectural Acoustic Insulation Panel System
item.content: Large-scale acoustic treatment for a modern concert hall. We manufactured custom-contoured foam panels that integrated seamlessly with the hall's organic design language. The system achieved a 40% improvement in sound absorption across critical frequencies while meeting strict Class A fire safety regulations.
